class.desc: This class basically defines a module's data.

var.name: probBag
var.desc: A place to store the modules collected problems.

var.name: state
var.desc: An integer which stores the basic state of the module.

var.name: stuckState
var.desc: In effect when the module is stuck, tells how badly stuck the module is.

var.name: miniState
var.desc: An additional integer which stores part of the module's state.

constant.name: STATE_START
constant.desc: An initial state which can be used by any module.

constant.name: STATE_BUSY
constant.desc: A intermediate state that tells that the module is not done doing something.

constant.name: STATE_STUCK
constant.desc: A bad state in which the module got an error.
